Play BitLife Online

Dive into the ultimate life‐simulation experience. Make choices that shape your destiny, build a fortune, and live your best (or worst!) life—all in your browser.

⭐ Discover Features

🎮 BitLife Online

Ready to begin your adventure? Click below when you’re prepared to load the game.

(Game only initializes when you choose—no waiting around.)

🎮 Explore More Games

🌟 Highlighted Features

🎓

Education Paths

Choose colleges, study hard, and unlock higher-paying careers. From community college to Ivy League, every decision counts.

💼

Career Progression

Start as an intern, climb the corporate ladder, or launch your own empire. Aim for CEO, celebrity, or even President—your legacy is in your hands.

❤️

Relationships

Date, marry, adopt kids, or even cheat. Keep your spouse happy, manage family drama, and see how your life choices impact your loved ones.

🚗

Billionaire Lifestyle

Buy fancy cars, mansions, and private jets. You work hard (or not), but you play hard—with endless luxuries at your fingertips.

🎉

Random Events

From winning lotteries to starring in viral memes, life in BitLife is unpredictable. Stay sharp—anything can happen at any moment.

🏆

Achievements & Awards

Earn trophies for getting rich, staying healthy, or living dangerously. Show off your accomplishments and compare with friends.

📖 How to Play

1. Start Your Life

Once the game appears above, click the green “Start Life” button. You’ll be born into a random family—your journey begins here.

2. Make Life Choices

At each age, choose actions for school, work, relationships, and more. Monitor your health, happiness, and bank account to stay in the game.

3. Plan for the Future

Save money, invest in real estate, or start a business. Your choices now determine whether you retire a millionaire or end up living on ramen.

4. Live & Repeat

When your character passes away, you can restart as a new life. Try new strategies, chase different goals, and see how your decisions change your story.

🕹️ Game Controls

  • 🖱️ Mouse / Touch: Tap or click menu items, buttons, and choices to navigate your life.
  • ⏩ Spacebar: Skip one year ahead.
  • ❌ Esc: Close pop-ups or back out of menus quickly.
  • 🎤 Text Input: In certain events (e.g., naming pets), simply type into the prompt box.

ℹ️ About BitLife

BitLife is a story‐based life simulator originally developed by Candywriter LLC for iOS and Android. Players make choices at every life stage—birth, childhood, education, career, and beyond—aiming to craft the success (or scandal) of their characters. The browser version embedded here is a community fan port that replicates the same features without requiring downloads.

Known for its dark humor, random events, and endless “what‐if” scenarios, BitLife appeals to players who love exploring cause and effect in a simulated world. Earn awards, break laws, or live quietly—there’s no single “right” way to win.

Whether you want to become a tech billionaire, a Hollywood superstar, or a con artist, every decision shapes your character’s legacy. The possibilities are limitless—just don’t get too carried away, or you might end up in jail!

💡 Tips & Tricks

1. Focus on Education Early

Raising your smarts stat unlocks better colleges, which in turn unlock better jobs. If you can, attend law or medical school for high starting salaries.

2. Balance Health & Happiness

Regularly visit the gym, eat healthy food, and keep relationships strong. A long, healthy life gives you more time to rack up achievements.

3. Invest & Save Wisely

Stocks, real estate, and businesses can all grow your net worth. Don’t blow it all on luxury cars—set aside a rainy day fund.

4. Try Wild Choices for Fun

Want to see what happens if you rob a bank or run for president? Risky decisions often result in hilarious stories (or a fast trip to jail).

❓ Frequently Asked Questions

Is BitLife Online free?

Yes! The embedded version is 100% free to play in your browser with no downloads or sign-ups required.

Can I play on mobile?

Absolutely! This iframe responds to touch input. For the best experience, use Chrome or Safari on any device.

Are my choices saved?

Since this is a fan port, your progress resets when you close the page. For permanent saves, play the official mobile apps.

Is this site affiliated with Candywriter?

No. This is an unofficial fan site. All trademarks belong to Candywriter LLC.
